maqras.text: jab asmaan phat jayega
aur apne rab ke hukm par kaan lagaayega aur osi ke laayeq wo hai
aur jab zameen (kheench kar) phaayla di jayegi
aur us mein jo hai ose wo ugal degi aur khaali ho jayegi
aur apne rab ke hukm par kaan lagayegi aur osi ke laayeq wo hai
aye insaan! tu apne rab se milne tak, ye koshish aur tamaam kaam, mehnate kar ke, us se mulaqaath karne wala hai
to (us waqt) jis shaqs ke daahne haath mein amaal naama diya jayega
us ka hisaab to badi asaani se liya jayega
aur wo apne ahal ki taraf hasi khushi laut ayega
haan jis shaqs ka amaal naama us ki peet ke piche se diya jayega
to wo mauth ko bulaane lagega
aur bhadakti hoyi jahannam mein dakhil hoga
ye shaqs apne mutaalleqeen mein (dunya mein) khush tha
us ka qayaal tha ke Allah ki taraf laut kar hee na jayega
kyo nahi, halaan ke us ka rab ose ba qoobi dekh raha tha
mujhe shafaq1 ki qasam! aur raath ki
aur us ki jama karda chizo ki qasam
aur chaandh ki jab ke wo, kaamil ho jaata hai
yaqinan tum ek haalath se dosri haalath par pahonchoge
unhe kya ho gaya hai ke imaan nahi laate
aur jab un ke paas Qur’aan pada jaata hai to sajda nahi karte
balke jinhone kufr kiya wo jhutla rahe hai
aur Allah ta’ala qoob jaanta hai, jo kuch ye dilo mein rakhte hai
unhe alm’naak azaabo ki khush qabri suna do
haan imaan waalo aur nek amaal waalo ko be’shumaar aur na qatam hone waala ajr hai
burujo waale asmaan ki qasam
waada kiye hoye din ki qasam
haazir hone waale aur haazir kiye gaye ki qasam
(ke) khandaqo waale halaak kiye gaye
wo ek aag thi indhan waali
jab ke wo log us ke aas paas baithe thein
aur musalmaano ke saath jo kar rahe thein, us ko apne saamne dekh rahe thein
ye log un musalmaano (ke kisi aur gunaah ka) badhla nahi le rahe thein sivaaye us ke, ke wo Allah ghaaleb laayeq hamdh ki zaath par imaan laaye thein
jis ke liye asmaan wa zameen ka milk(milkiyath) hai aur Allah ta’ala ke saamne hai har cheez
beshak jin logo ne musalmaan mardo aur aurto ko sataaya aur phir tauba (bhi) na ki to un ke liye jahannam ka azaab hai aur jalne ka azaab hai
beshak imaan qubool karne waalo aur nek kaam karne waalo ke liye, wo baghaath hai, jin ke niche nehre beh rahi hai, yahi badi kamyaabi hai
yaqinan tere rab ki pakad badi saqth hai
wahi pehli martaba paida karta hai aur wahi dobaara paida karega
wo bada baqshish karne waala aur bahuth muhabbath karne waala hai
arsh ka maalik azmath waala hai
jo chaahe ose kar guzarne waale hai
tujhe lashkaro ki qabar bhi mili hai
yaane feraun aur samoodh ki
(kuch nahi) balke kaafir to jhutlaane mein pade hoye hai
aur Allah ta’ala bhi unhe har taraf se ghere hoye hai
balke ye Qur’aan hai badi shaan waala
lauhe mehfooz mein (likh hoa)
qasam hai asmaan ki aur andhere mein roushan hone waale ki
tujhe maloom bhi hai ke wo raath ko namodaar hone waali cheez kya hai
wo roushan sitaara hai
koyi aisa nahi, jis par nigehbaan farishta na ho
insaan ko dekhna chahiye ke wo kis cheez se paida kiya gaya hai
wo ek uchalte paani se paida kiya gaya hai
jo peet aur sine ke darmiyaan se nikalta hai
beshak wo ise pher laane par yaqinan khudrath rakhne waala hai
jis din poshida bhedho ki jaanch padtaal hogi
to na hoga us ke paas kuch zoor na madadgaar
baarish waale asmaan ki qasam
aur phatne waale zameen ki qasam
beshak ye (Qur’aan) albatta do tok faisla karne waala kalaam hai
ye hasi ki (aur be fayeda) baath nahi
albatta kaafir daao ghaath mein hai
aur main bhi ek chaal chal raha hoon
tu kaafiro ko muhallath de, inhe thode dino chohd de
